channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 03:34 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 03:34 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Follow for further updates. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
